items.title: New Christian Leadership Training
items.summary: We're beginning monthly training sessions on key topics such as: Bible Interpretation, Small Group Leadership, Missional Living & Hospitality, and Lay Counseling. This class builds on the Total Christ vision from Sunday School. It is especially for small group leaders and anyone aspiring to grow in their faith and service to the church. All are welcome. Starts this Friday, Sept. 26, 6:30-8:30pm, meal provided. Will continue Oct. 24 & Nov. 21. See website for readings.

items.title: Interested in Joining CPC?
items.summary: We consider the church an essential element of the gospel, so joining CPC as a member is a way to truly join the body of Christ, in all its blessings and with all its flaws! Before joining, you'll meet one-on-one with a pastor and then discuss how you've come to know Christ with the Shepherd Leaders. Contact Alexis Vano (admin@cpcnewhaven.org) to begin the process.

items.title: Pastor Drop-In Office Hours
items.summary: Starting September 12, Pastor Craig, Fridays 7:30am-10:30am | Other hours available upon request. Drop in for a casual time of discussion, Q&A, prayer, coffee, tea, really whatever you want to make it! Wondering what God is doing in a certain part of your life? Let's wonder together! Have a tricky situation at home or work? Let's discern best steps! Want to just chat about nothing in particular? Come on in! If you have a more private or formal need, you're always welcome to set up a separate time with Pastor Craig (craig.luekens@cpcnewhaven.org), or Pastor Jerry (jerry.ornelas@cpcnewhaven.org), but this is meant to be a space where anyone can drop in.
